sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This fix script is used to change the value of existing agreement type choices of Enterprise Agreement and Enterprise Term Licensing Agreement for upgrading customers.</description>
        <name>Fix agreement type values</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function updateAgreementTypeValue(tableQuery, oldValue, newValue, dependentValue) {
	var valChangeGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
	valChangeGr.addQuery('name', tableQuery);
	valChangeGr.addQuery('element', 'agreement_type');
	valChangeGr.addQuery('value', oldValue);
	valChangeGr.addQuery('dependent_value', dependentValue);
	valChangeGr.setValue('value', newValue);
	valChangeGr.updateMultiple();
}

updateAgreementTypeValue('alm_license', 'enterprise', 'enterprise_term', '6f39312273720300759a259dfaf6a74f');
updateAgreementTypeValue('alm_license', 'enterprise', 'enterprise_agreement', '85253c9593222200caef14f1b47ffb02');]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-12-03 20:49:18</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9e25227c0b610010da8b851437673ab6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Fix agreement type values</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">bd1f72f347213110020ba9f8536d43db</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_9e25227c0b610010da8b851437673ab6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-01-06 23:04:19</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
